auditChecks.name: Keyboard navigation
auditChecks.description: Primary navigation, forms, and dialogs are fully operable using keyboard controls.
auditChecks.recommendation: Maintain keyboard testing in release QA to prevent focus order regressions.

auditChecks.name: Screen reader support
auditChecks.description: Most semantic landmarks are announced correctly, but some dynamic announcements are delayed.
auditChecks.recommendation: Add aria-live regions for async success and error state messaging.

auditChecks.name: Color contrast
auditChecks.description: Several secondary text tokens and disabled states fall below WCAG AA contrast thresholds.
auditChecks.recommendation: Raise contrast tokens to at least 4.5:1 for normal text and 3:1 for UI indicators.

auditChecks.name: Alt text
auditChecks.description: Meaningful imagery includes descriptive alternatives and decorative assets are hidden from assistive tech.
auditChecks.recommendation: Continue enforcing alt text checks in content publishing workflows.

auditChecks.name: Focus indicators
auditChecks.description: Focus rings are visible in most components but can be hard to detect on gradient backgrounds.
auditChecks.recommendation: Increase focus ring thickness and contrast on dark and gradient surfaces.

auditChecks.name: Heading structure
auditChecks.description: Pages consistently use hierarchical heading order to support assistive navigation.
auditChecks.recommendation: Keep heading lint checks enabled in CI for template changes.

auditChecks.name: Form labels
auditChecks.description: Inputs are programmatically associated with labels and include accessible error text.
auditChecks.recommendation: Add label association tests for new dynamic form components.

auditChecks.name: ARIA attributes
auditChecks.description: A subset of interactive widgets has incomplete aria-expanded and aria-controls state sync.
auditChecks.recommendation: Audit custom interactive controls and ensure ARIA state is updated on every interaction.
